channel.title: Projects on Buckethead Creations
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Buckethead Creations

item.title: Eustace - Gamblers Delight
item.description: References Pattern Human pattern by Choly Knight + clothes from fairy expansion Materials Part Material Amount/Cost body Shannon cuddle bluebell 50x50cm: 4.35 hair Shannon cuddle peacock 50x50cm: 4.35 face detailing embroidery thread + felt ?: ? clothes White and black Interlock jersey, striped interlock jersey ?: ? Bought from plushaddict and minerva crafts Time 46 hours

item.title: Ophanim
item.description: References Pattern Doughnut pattern by Choly Knight + self drafting Materials Part Material Amount/Cost body Shannon cuddle red 75x75cm: ~8 fire Shannon cuddle sky blue ?: ~\3 wings Shannon cuddle royal blue and purple 100x75cm: 10 detailing embroidery thread + felt ?: ? All bought from plush addict Time Over a month Gallery Maker’s Notes I wanted to build an angel, something inspired by the Ophanim.

item.title: Saitama - One Punch Man
item.description: References Pattern Human pattern by Choly Knight Materials Part Material Amount/Cost body Shannon cuddle canary yellow ?: ? face Shannon cuddle nude ?: ? misc embroidery thread, felt, zipper head, yellow button ?: ? cape Interlock jersey white, black buttons ?: ? All bought from plush addict Time A week or so Gallery Maker’s Notes This time I made his clothes as part of the plush itself, a much easier choice and suitable for the jumpsuit.

item.title: Izuku Midoriya - My Hero Academia
item.description: References Pattern Human pattern by Choly Knight + clothes from fairy expansion Materials Part Material Amount/Cost body Shannon cuddle nude 50x50cm: 4.35 hair Shannon cuddle emerald ?: ? face detailing embroidery thread + felt ?: ? jumpsuit Interlock jersey teal and white, red and white shannon cuddle, black felt detailing ?: ? All bought from plush addict

item.title: Squid Pouch
item.description: Pattern Pattern by Choly Knight Materials Shannon cuddle electric blue, sky blue, light blue invisible zip, Dashwood Studios Laska cotton whales All bought from plush addict Gallery Maker’s Notes Making a zip bag for the first time was fun. I should have pushed the tentacles further into the seam however, the lining lies a bit weirdly because they take up too much space on the inside.

item.title: Koala
item.description: Pattern Pattern by DIYFluffies/Mariska Vos-Bolman Materials Shannon cuddle platinum, black, white, sky blue, kelly green Black felt, white buttons All bought from plush addict Gallery
